name: Darth Vax
content:
Darth Vax was a female Dark Lord of the Sith of Human or Sith pureblood descent who served on the Dark Council of the reconstituted Sith Empire sometime before the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. Vax had a son, who succeeded his mother on the Dark Council after Vax's death years prior to the war, and her son took on the title Darth Arrid. However, Vax's will enabled to her to persist as a Force ghost, and she began to manipulate her son, using him as a mouthpiece to continue her rule from beyond the graveâ€”a deception that took the other Dark Council members four years to discover.
Darth Vax was mentioned in the "Force Ghost" Codex entry in Chapter XII of Knights of the Fallen Empire, the 2015 Digital Expansion to the 2011 BioWare video game, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
